sourcesContent:
export const styles = {
    flexStart: 'flex justify-center items-start',
    container: 'xl:max-w-[1700] w-full',
    paragraph: 'font-montserrat font-normal text-mylight text-[18px] leading-[30.8px]',
    padX: 'sm:px-16 px-6',
    padY: 'sm:py-16 py-6',
    pad: 'sm:px-16 px-6 sm:py-12 py-4',
    marX: 'sm:px-16 mx-6',
    marY: 'sm:my-16 my-6',
    heading: 'font-myfont font-semibold ss:text-[72px] text-[52px] text-white ss:leading-[100px] leading-[75px]',
    header: 'font-myfont font-semibold xs:text-[48px] text-[40px] text-myteal leading-[76.8px]',
}
